desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。

desc.en: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.

desc.zh_tw: PMC理事提出要将众人造成的损失一并加入欠款金额中。星野认出了他，后者像星野问好，并“无意间”说出了自己雇佣便利屋和头盔团的事情。之后，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好谈论一下债务。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的對策委員會一行人面前。對策委員會趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.thai: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.ko: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的對策委員會一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亞瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的阿露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.

desc.zh_tw: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。對策委員會将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。

desc.en: 愛麗絲剛剛接受了工程師部和貝裡塔斯的檢查，並被要求要定期來訪。貝裡塔斯沒有找到Kei的痕跡，不過愛麗絲表示，下一次見到Kei時，她會更加大力地把她打飛的。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 作为全千禧年最厉害的黑客，日鞠承担下了对莉央建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉央直接推卸了责任。日鞠访问了莉央存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 作为全千年最厉害的黑客，阳葵承担下了对莉音建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉音直接推卸了责任。阳葵访问了莉音存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
